items.sentence: When Tom bought his car, he didn't know that it had been involved in a serious accident.
Mary's phone kept cutting out and she couldn't make out what Tom was trying to tell her.
Tom was walking on the sidewalk on the other side of the road and didn't seem to see me.
The identity of the boy who had been missing was verified by the clothes he was wearing.
Tom and Mary spent the time talking to each other and getting to know each other better.
